text: haey yeung ban banhchoun sa leh towkean( kolosampnth) sa mou ddel chea bangobaaun robsa puokke . ke ban pol tha ao krom robsa khnhom. chaur puok anak korp sakkar champoh a l laoh choh puok anak kmean mcheasa na phe sa ng krawpi trong laey . mou chi hsaa t pi mcheasa robsa puok anak pitchea ban mokadl puok anak nih kuchea satv audth nhi robsa a l laoh del chea ph st tang muoy samreab puok anak . dau che neah chaur puok anak touk aoy vea daer sai now leu phendei robsa a l laoh choh haey puok anak kom bahpeal vea daoy brakear akrak namuoy aoy saoh baemindauchnaohte tearounakamm da chhu chab nung thleak mk leu puok anak cheaminkhan
